name: EconodayGlobalMarketUpdate
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Econoday's Global Market Update Flash Brief gives a daily wrap up and looking forward analysis of the Days events for U.S., European and Asian Economic happenings. You can also check out the U.S. economic online calendar at mam.econoday.com. For comments, suggestions or help, please email us at support@econoday.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
